UI_TEXT.你好，欢迎使用ZML节点~\n此节点会筛选掉你不想要的一些tag，你可以将R18:
Hello, welcome to ZML Nodes~
This node filters out unwanted tags. You can input R18 tags into the lower text box, and it will remove them from the text in the upper text box. For example, if the upper input is '1girl,solo,nsfw,' and the lower is 'nsfw,', the output will be '1girl,solo'. The filtered text can also be output at the '*Filtered*' interface; if you don't need to output the filtered tags, simply don't connect a wire to it.
Have a happy life and a happy day~
UI_TEXT.输入要删除的标签或子字符串（用英文逗号分隔）: Enter tags or substrings to delete (comma-separated)
UI_TEXT.你好，欢迎使用ZML节点~\n此节点会从第一个文本中删除第二个文本中指定的标签或:
Hello, welcome to ZML Nodes~
This node deletes specified tags or substrings from the first text using the second text. For example: if Text 1 is '#1girl,2girls,solo,' and Text 2 is '2girls,#,1,o,', the output will be 'girl,sl,'. After deletion, extra commas will be cleaned up automatically.
Wish you happy use!
UI_TEXT.ZML 文本行节点 (支持从文本框或文件读取): ZML Text Line Node (supports reading from text box or file)
UI_TEXT.当'文件选择'为'禁用'时，此文本框生效: This text box is active when 'File Selection' is 'Disabled'
UI_TEXT.你好~欢迎使用ZML节点~本节点现在支持两种输入方式：文件或文本框。\n1. *:
Hello~ Welcome to ZML Nodes~ This node now supports two input methods: file or text box.
1. **File Mode**: Select a .txt file from the 'zml_w/txt' folder in the dropdown menu. The node will ignore the text box content and read text lines from the selected file.
2. **Text Box Mode**: Set the dropdown menu to 'Disabled', then you can directly enter content in the text box below.

The node supports three loading modes:
- **Index**: Loads the corresponding line according to the specified 'Index' value.
- **Sequential**: Loads the next line in sequence each time it runs; counters are independent for different nodes and reset on restart.
- **Random**: Randomly selects a line each time it runs.

Have a happy day~
UI_TEXT.错误: 文件 '{文件选择}' 未在目录 '{self.txt_dir}' 中找: Error: File '{文件选择}' not found in directory '{self.txt_dir}'.
UI_TEXT.错误: 读取文件 '{文件选择}' 时发生错误: {e}: Error: An error occurred while reading file '{文件选择}': {e}
UI_TEXT.ZML 随机文本权重节点 (支持从文本框或文件读取): ZML Random Text Weight Node (supports reading from text box or file)
UI_TEXT.当'文件'为'禁用 (使用文本框)'时，加载此处的标签或多行文本: When 'File' is 'Disabled (Use text box)', load tags or multi-line text from here
UI_TEXT.你好~欢迎使用ZML节点~\n此节点会自动读取'zml_w/txt'文件夹下的t:
Hello~ Welcome to ZML Nodes~
This node automatically reads .txt files from the 'zml_w/txt' folder. Select a file from the dropdown menu, and the node will randomly select a specified number of lines or tags from it, assigning each line/tag a random weight between your set minimum and maximum values (inclusive of boundaries). You can also set the number of decimal places for the weight. If each line ends with a comma, the node will automatically remove it to ensure correct weight formatting. The node comes with a 1000 artist .txt file, and you can add other .txt files yourself.
If no .txt file is read, it will load tags from the text box and randomly add weights to them!
Have fun~
UI_TEXT.下拉菜单中未选择有效文件，请检查 '.../zml_w/txt' 目录下是否有t: No valid file selected in the dropdown menu. Please check if there are .txt files in the '.../zml_w/txt' directory and restart ComfyUI.
UI_TEXT.ZML_选择文本节点：通过外部接口输入文本，并在节点内选择合并。: ZML Select Text Node: Inputs text through external interfaces and combines them within the node.
UI_TEXT.ZML_选择文本V2节点：在节点内部输入文本并选择合并。: ZML Select Text V2 Node: Inputs text within the node and combines them based on selection.
UI_TEXT.ZML_选择文本V3节点：具有动态UI，可以自由添加、删除、启用/禁用文本行。: ZML Select Text V3 Node: Features dynamic UI for freely adding, deleting, enabling/disabling text lines.
UI_TEXT.ZML 文本分离节点：根据指定字符或字符串将文本分割成两部分。: ZML Split Text Node: Splits text into two parts based on a specified character or string.
UI_TEXT.输入用于分割文本的字符或字符串: Enter the character or string to split the text by
UI_TEXT.ZML_追加提示词节点: ZML Append Text by Keyword Node
UI_TEXT.输入要追加或替换的预设文本: Enter preset text to append or replace
UI_TEXT.你好~欢迎使用ZML节点~\n此节点可以检测输入文本中的关键词，并根据选择的模式:
Hello~ Welcome to ZML Nodes~
This node can detect keywords in the input text and process the text according to the selected mode.
- Keywords: Separate multiple keywords with commas
- If the input text contains any of the keywords, the corresponding operation will be performed
- Append Mode: Appends the preset text to the input text
- Replace Tags Mode: Only replaces tags that match the keywords
- Full Replace Mode: Completely replaces the input text with the preset text
Wish you happy use!
UI_TEXT.你好~欢迎使用ZML合并相同提示词节点~\n此节点可以合并输入文本中的重复提示词:
Hello~ Welcome to ZML Merge Duplicate Prompts Node~
This node can merge duplicate prompts in the input text, defaulting to using the weight of the first occurring prompt.
For example: Input "1girl,solo,nsfw,1girl", output "1girl,solo,nsfw"
It supports processing prompts with weights, such as (1girl:1.2) and 1girl, which will be recognized as the same prompt and merged, retaining the weight of the first occurrence.
Wish you happy use!
